interface.name: webalizer_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute webalizer in the webalizer domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: webalizer_run
interface.summary: Execute webalizer in the webalizer domain, and allow the specified role the webalizer domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the webalizer domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the webalizer domain to use.
